Description: Test user registration with all valid inputs using Equivalence Class Partitioning
Acceptance Criteria: User successfully registered with valid email, password, name, and role. Database entry created. Password hashed. Verification email sent.

Description: Test registration with invalid email format (missing domain)
Acceptance Criteria: System rejects invalid email. Error message displayed. No database entry created.

Description: Test login with correct email and password
Acceptance Criteria: User logged in successfully. JWT token issued. Redirected to dashboard.
Login rejected. Error message: Invalid credentials. User not logged in.

Description: Test password change with exactly 8 characters (minimum boundary)
Acceptance Criteria: Password accepted. Successfully updated in database. User can login with new password.

Description: Test password change with 7 characters (below minimum)
Acceptance Criteria: Password rejected. Error: Minimum 8 characters required.

Description: Test password change with exactly 128 characters (maximum boundary)
Acceptance Criteria: Password accepted. Successfully updated in database.

Description: Test password change with 129 characters (above maximum)
Acceptance Criteria: Password rejected. Error: Maximum 128 characters allowed.

Description: Update user bio with valid text (100 characters)
Acceptance Criteria: Bio updated successfully. Changes visible on profile page. Database updated.
Bio accepted and saved. All 500 characters stored in database.
Bio rejected. Error: Maximum 500 characters allowed.
Image uploaded successfully. Avatar displayed on profile. File stored on server.
Image accepted. Upload successful. Boundary value test passed.
Upload rejected. Error: Maximum file size is 10MB.
Upload rejected. Error: Only JPG PNG WebP allowed.
Skill added successfully. Displayed on profile.
Skill accepted. Minimum boundary validated.
All 10 skills accepted. Maximum boundary validated.
11th skill rejected. Error: Maximum 10 skills allowed.

Description: Click verification link with valid token
Acceptance Criteria: Email verified successfully. User account activated. Can now login.
Token rejected. Error: Verification link expired. Resend option shown.
Profile visible to all users. Search results include user.
Profile hidden from public. Not in search results.
Registration rejected. Error: Must be 18 or older.
Age accepted. Registration proceeds.
Age accepted. Registration proceeds.
Registration rejected. Error: Maximum age 65.
Phone number accepted. Saved in profile.
Phone rejected. Error: Must be 11 digits.
Account deleted. All data removed. User logged out. Cannot login again.
Account NOT deleted. User remains logged in. All data intact.
Session expired. User logged out automatically. Must login again.
Both sessions active. JWT tokens independent. Valid behavior.

Description: Enter SQL code in email field: '; DROP TABLE users--
Acceptance Criteria: Input sanitized. No SQL executed. Registration rejected or email escaped.
Script not executed. HTML escaped. Displayed as plain text.

Description: Submit profile update without CSRF token
Acceptance Criteria: Request rejected. Error: Invalid or missing CSRF token.

Description: Attempt login 6 times with wrong password
Acceptance Criteria: After 5 attempts account locked for 15 minutes. 6th attempt blocked.

Description: Measure response time for registration endpoint
Acceptance Criteria: Response time < 2 seconds. Acceptable performance.

Description: Measure response time for loading profile page
Acceptance Criteria: Response time < 500ms. Excellent performance.
Graceful error shown. No system crash. Error logged. User notified.
Error handled gracefully. User notified to try later. Registration still succeeds.
CORS configured correctly. Upload succeeds or proper error shown.

Description: View profile page on mobile device (375px width)
Acceptance Criteria: Page displays correctly. All elements visible. No horizontal scroll.

Description: Enable dark mode and check all profile components
Acceptance Criteria: All components properly styled. Text readable. No white backgrounds.

Description: Use screen reader to navigate profile page
Acceptance Criteria: All elements announced. Proper ARIA labels. Navigation logical.

Description: Navigate settings form using only keyboard (Tab/Enter)
Acceptance Criteria: All fields accessible. Tab order logical. Enter submits form.

Description: Test profile module on Google Chrome latest
Acceptance Criteria: All features working. No console errors. UI renders correctly.

Description: Test profile module on Mozilla Firefox latest
Acceptance Criteria: All features working. No console errors. UI renders correctly.
All features working. No console errors. UI renders correctly.
